content: *show your patriotic spirit with this american flag afghan lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # chs-americanaafghan crochet terms are in u s terminology skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 a antique 4 balls *color discontinued* b deco 3 balls c colonial 2 balls plus d 620-099 wool-ease yarn fisherman 1 ball *for stars* note almost all of a and b are used crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm *for stars* gauge 10 sts x 10 row = 4 / 10cm in single_crochet with k hook 10 sts x 6½ row = 4 /10cm in double_crochet with k hook ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ *ed note use color d and size h-8 5 mm hook to work stars see lionbrand com americana afghan knit version pdf 2 for additional options for the stars * knit version americana afghan knit 3 shown with americana hat 4 and scarf 5 crochet 2 http //www lionbrand com/printablepatterns/khs-americanaafghan pdf 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/americana-afghan-knit 4 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/americana-hat--scarf-to-crochet-hat 5 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/americana-hat--scarf-to-crochet-scarf
